mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Agency VALUES (seq_agency.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{nameOfAgency}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, sysdate, #{expireOfDate}, 0, #{paid}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE agency SET contactName = #{contactName}, nameOfAgency = #{nameOfAgency}, contactPhone = #{contactPhone}, issueOfDate = #{issueOfDate}, expireOfDate = #{expireOfDate}, countOfextend = #{countOfextend}, paid = #{paid}, usedCount = #{usedCount}, reg_date = sysdate WHERE agencyNo = #{agencyNo}
UPDATE agency SET expireofdate = add_months(to_date(expireofdate),#{addMonths}), paid = paid + #{paid}, countOfextend = countOfextend + 1 WHERE agencyNo = #{agencyNo};
mapper.select: SELECT nameOfAgency FROM agency WHERE nameOfAgency = #{nameOfAgency} and memberNo = #{memberNo}
